name: Mushroom Onion Saute
description: Mushroom onion saute. A delicious and easy throw together snack, lunch or dinner for weeknights or when you're pushed for time. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups white mushrooms or chopped portabello.
1 pinch red chili powder or cayenne pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add a Tablespoon of oil.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add a Tablespoon of oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a half a medium onion chopped or sliced.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a half a medium onion chopped or sliced.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on low heat for 3-4 minutes until just about translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on low heat for 3-4 minutes until just about translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped white mushrooms or chopped portabello.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped white mushrooms or chopped portabello.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well and cook covered on low heat for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well and cook covered on low heat for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in salt and red chili powder or cayenne pepper to taste, mix well and cook partially covered until mushrooms are tender. (10-15 minutes)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in salt and red chili powder or cayenne pepper to taste, mix well and cook partially covered until mushrooms are tender. (10-15 minutes)
